text: Passwords are like underwear: don’t let people see it, change it very often, and you shouldn’t share it with strangers.
Cyber-Security is much more than a matter of IT.
It takes 20 years to build a reputation and few minutes of cyber-incident to ruin it.
Cyber security is like locking your house or car - it doesn't stop the bad guys, but if it's good enough they may move to on to an easier target.
Someone figured-out my PASSWORD. Now I have to rename my dog!
All passwords should enforce new requirements: contain letters, numbers, doodles, sign language and squirrel noises.
Security is always excessive until it’s not enough.
IoT without security = Internet of Threats
You are an essential ingredient in our ongoing effort to reduce Security Risk.
Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right.
There's no silver bullet solution with cyber security, a layered defense is the only viable defense
